overview.title: Cats vs Dogs
overview.excerpt: Binary image classification to distinguish between cats and dogs using CNNs.

details.title: Cats vs Dogs
details.longDescription: This project builds a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to classify images of cats and dogs. Users can explore convolutional layers, pooling layers, data augmentation, dropout, and model evaluation techniques. The project is ready for training and experimentation with different CNN architectures.
